title: Handwriting Style Joined Up Font
content:
Hi,

I had a logo designed and now I can't contact the designer. I'd like to know what the font is.

I've tried various tools to try and work it out, but I just can't seem to find one that matches. I think it may be in italics (I'm not sure if it's tilted by default), but I don't know if that affects the tools or not.

Any help would be appreciated.  
Thanks in advance.

Font: 

 Lobster 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132058/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [name\_postcard.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132058/http:/typophile.com/files/name_postcard.jpg) | 11.17 KB |
author: makzan

comments.content: @Ryuk, thank you very much! That's the exact font. You're a genius!
